scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:worker && npm run deploy:pages
scripts.deploy:pages: node -e "process.env.GITHUB_PAGES='1'; require('child_process').execSync('npm run build --prefix frontend', {stdio:'inherit', env:process.env})" && npx gh-pages -d frontend/dist -b gh-pages
scripts.run:pipeline: cd pipeline && pip install -q -r requirements-ci.txt && python run_scrape_and_sync.py
